00040 #ifndef PHYSEVENTUSERINPUT_CPP
00041 #define PHYSEVENTUSERINPUT_CPP
00042 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00043 // This will expose all keyboard and mouse, joystick and other userinput events
00044 // to developers, we are using the SDL keymap to get us started, large portions
00045 // are directly copy/pasta'd, so we included their license too
00046 ///////////////////////////////////////
00047 
00048 
00049 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00050 // Includes
00051 #include "physeventuserinput.h"
00052 #include "physevent.h"
00053 #include <stdarg.h>
00054 #include <vector>
00055 
00056 #include "SDL.h"
00057 
00058 using namespace std;
00059 
00060 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00061 // MetaCode
00062 
00063 MetaCode::MetaCode()
00064 {}
00065 
00066 MetaCode::MetaCode(int MetaValue_, short unsigned int ID_, InputCode Code_)
00067 {
00068     Construct(MetaValue_, ID_, Code_);
00069 }
00070 
00071 MetaCode::MetaCode(RawEvent _RawEvent)
00072 {
00073     //TODO: Actually process each event
00074     //Make a metacode for each event and return it
00075     switch(_RawEvent.type)
00076     {
00077         case SDL_KEYDOWN:
00078             break;
00079         case SDL_KEYUP:
00080             break;
00081         case SDL_MOUSEMOTION:
00082             break;
00083         case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00084             break;
00085         case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP:
00086             break;
00087         case SDL_JOYAXISMOTION:
00088             break;
00089         case SDL_JOYBUTTONDOWN:
00090             break;
00091         case SDL_JOYBUTTONUP:
00092             break;
00093         case SDL_JOYBALLMOTION:
00094             break;
00095         case SDL_JOYHATMOTION:
00096             break;
00097         default:
00098             throw ("Unknown SDL Event Inserted");
00099             break;
00100     }
00101 }
00102 
00103 void MetaCode::Construct(int MetaValue_, short unsigned int ID_, InputCode Code_)
00104 {
00105     SetMetaValue(MetaValue_);
00106     SetID(ID_);
00107     SetCode(Code_);
00108 }
00109 
00110 int MetaCode::GetMetaValue()
00111 {
00112     return this->MetaValue;
00113 }
00114 
00115 InputCode MetaCode::GetCode()
00116 {
00117     return this->Code;
00118 }
00119 
00120 short unsigned int MetaCode::GetID()
00121 {
00122     return this->ID;
00123 }
00124 
00125 void MetaCode::SetMetaValue(int MetaValue_)
00126 {
00127     this->MetaValue=MetaValue_;
00128 }
00129 
00130 void MetaCode::SetCode(InputCode Code_)
00131 {
00132     this->Code=Code_;
00133 }
00134 
00135 void MetaCode::SetID(short unsigned int ID_)
00136 {
00137     this->ID=ID_;
00138 }
00139 
00140 bool MetaCode::operator==(const MetaCode &other) const
00141 {
00142     if(this->Code == other.Code && this->MetaValue == other.MetaValue)
00143     {
00144         return true;
00145     }else{
00146         return false;
00147     }
00148 }

00151 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00152 // PhysEventUserInput
00153 PhysEventUserInput::PhysEventUserInput()
00154 {
00155 
00156 }
00157 
00158 PhysEventUserInput::PhysEventUserInput(MetaCode Code_)
00159 {
00160     Code.push_back(Code_);
00161 }
00162 
00163 PhysEventUserInput::PhysEventUserInput(vector<MetaCode> Code_)
00164 {
00165     for(unsigned int c=0; Code_.size()>c ; c++)
00166     {
00167         Code.push_back(Code_.at(c));
00168     }
00169 }
00170 
00171 PhysEventUserInput::~PhysEventUserInput()
00172 {
00173 
00174 }
00175 
00176 MetaCode PhysEventUserInput::GetCode(unsigned int Index)
00177 {
00178     return Code.at(Index);
00179 }
00180 
00181 unsigned int PhysEventUserInput::GetCodeCount()
00182 {
00183     return Code.size();
00184 }
00185 
00186 void PhysEventUserInput::AddCode(MetaCode _Code)
00187 {
00188     Code.push_back(_Code);
00189 }
00190 
00191 void PhysEventUserInput::ToggleCode(MetaCode _Code)
00192 {
00193     vector<MetaCode>::iterator iter;
00194 
00195     for(iter=Code.begin(); Code.end()!=iter ; iter++)
00196     {
00197         if(*iter == _Code)
00198         {
00199             Code.erase(iter);
00200         }else{
00201             Code.push_back(_Code);
00202         }
00203     }
00204 }
00205 
00206 void PhysEventUserInput::ToggleCode(unsigned int Index)
00207 {
00208     Code.erase(Code.begin()+Index);
00209 }
00210 
00211 EventType PhysEventUserInput::getEventType()
00212 {
00213     return UserInput;
00214 }
